steps: step 3: Click on link mobileBrands (Apple) -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
step 5: Select storage options and proceed to checkout
step 6: Fill in shipping address details during checkout
step 7: Enter input value in input City
step 10: Enter input value in input State
step 12: Enter input value in input Phone
step 13: Click on button ContinueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
step 14: Click on button CompleteOrder -> Navigate to page ''
step 15: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
